title: Why are all my friends quitting league?
body: I have 200 contacts and from those only around 20 log in to league anymore... I've been playing since 2013 its 3 years sure but still why 180 of my contact list already quit league altogether... last year 140 of them logged in to league at different times, why the sudden mass exodus?

replies.body: because season 6 is a terrible season. Have to be dedicated as fuck to still be here. or boosted

DQ. Its driving players away from the game, particularly solo players, which, of course, are required for DQ to function at all.

Riot managed to create a system that is literally incapable of sustaining itself and will inevitably lead to the collapse of this game unless it is changed dramatically or removed completely.
go to gameplay section , you'll see why yourself :P
